title: A note-taking app
text: The note-taking platform will allow you to save and organize all important thoughts, ideas, and links in one place.
text-2: The visibility level will allow you to save both private and public notes if you want to share a note with friends.
text-3: Thanks to smart search and careful filtering, you will never get lost in the list of your notes and you will know exactly how to find the note you need.
